p.d: Lucas, aged 12, is an only child. That is, until his mother moves in with her new companion and his three children. Lucas will have to find his place amongst his new brothers and sisters, who are very polite and well-behaved, whereas he is more of a dreamer and a bit cheeky with it. Directed by: Jérôme Dernovoi, Lionel Delhaye, Benjamin Torrini (Belgium, 2017)
